alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Franklin; Licking (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 3:38PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN FRANKLIN, SOUTHEASTERN DELAWARE AND NORTHERN LICKING COUNTIES THROUGH 415 PM EDT... At 337 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Johnstown, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Pataskala, Johnstown, Utica, New Albany, Jersey, Alexandria, Hartford, St. Louisville, Fredonia, US Route 62 at State Route 661, Purity, State Route 310 at State Route 161, Center Village and Fallsburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
